text: aur (ai rasool) logon ko us din se darao (jis din) un par azaab naazil hoga to jin logon ne naapharamaanee kee thee (gidagida kar) arz karegen ki ai hamaare paalane vaale ham ko thodee see mohalat aur de de (abakee baar) ham tere bulaane par zarur uth khade hogen aur sab rasoolon kee pairavee karegen (to unako javaab milega) kya tum vah log nahin ho jo usake pahale (us par) qasamen khaaya karate the ki tum ko kisee tarah ka zavvaal (nuksaan) nahin
